2.text: Read the given description about Munidasa Cumaratunga.
2.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>Read the given description about <phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='munidasa kumaratuŋga'>Munidasa Cumaratunga</phoneme>.</prosody></speak>

3.text: Munidasa Cumaratunga Munidasa Cumaratunga was born on 25th July 1887. He was a writer, poet, journalist and grammarian. He wrote many Sinhala story books. Heenseraya, Hathpana, Magulkema and Kiyawana Nuwana are some of them. These books are popular among children even today.
3.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'><phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='munidasa kumaratuŋga'>Munidasa Cumaratunga</phoneme> <phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='munidasa kumaratuŋga'>Munidasa Cumaratunga</phoneme> was born on 25th July 1887. He was a writer, poet, journalist and grammarian. He wrote many Sinhala story books. Heenseraya, Hathpana, Magulkema and Kiyawana Nuwana are some of them. These books are popular among children even today.</prosody></speak>

4.text: Munidasa Cumaratunga founded the "Hela Havula" movement to promote the correct usage of the Sinhala language. He wrote Sinhala grammar books and had a wide knowledge of other languages like Tamil, Pali, Sanskrit, Greek and Latin. In his lifetime, he served as a school teacher, principal and school inspector. This eminent scholar passed away on 2nd March 1944.
